text: The Philadelphia Experiment is a 1984 American Canadian science fiction romantic fantasy movie directed by Stewart Raffill and was based on the 1979 novel by Charles Berlitz and William L. Moore. It stars Michael Par√©, Nancy Allen, Eric Christmas, Bobby Di Cicco, Louise Latham, Kene Holliday and was distributed by New World Pictures. It was followed by a sequel in 1993. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1984 science fiction movies Category:1984 romance movies Category:1984 fantasy movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American romance movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:Canadian science fiction movies Category:Canadian romance movies Category:Canadian fantasy movies Category:Movies directed by Stewart Raffill Category:Time travel movies Category:Movies about conspiracy theories Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:Movies set in the 1980s Category:Movies set in South Carolina
title: The Philadelphia Experiment (movie)
